attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the reliance on petroleum based fuel to power cars by encouraging the use of sustainable biodiesel. This should be grown and refined in Europe to minimise transportation costs from crops grown in the Americas to the detriment of forests.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce the duty on Biodiesel."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11082.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/biodiesel/
